context.content: Hello what a good action movie I like Rampage (2018)
Hi! I havent seen it! Ill take a look. I'm into action also.

I liked Rush Hour (1998) The other two arent as good!
Old classic is always good I like them all
Seriously! I love him!! He's had some flops but also some good ones!
Great to hear you love Will Smith! Do you have a preference for any specific type of action, like comedy, sci-fi, or something else?

I really enjoy a mix of action and teamwork, especially when there's a strong ensemble cast. There's this fantastic film where a group of superheroes comes together to save the world from a powerful threat. The action sequences are thrilling, and the characters have great chemistry. It's a must-watch for any action fan!
